text: Answer: (a, b, c, d) Solution: (a) In case of FCFS the average turnaround time could be minimize, if the process arrives in the increasing order of burst. (b) Round Robin could have a minimum turnaround time if the time quantum is more than the burst time of all the process & process arrive in the increasing order of burst time. (c) SRTF has minimum average turnaround time. (d) In Preemptive priority-based scheduling if the priority is assigned in a way that the process with minimum burst time has the highest priority then it could have minimum average turnaround time.
